roleset.name: to face with bold self-assurance
roleset.note: BRAZEN_OUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'brazen' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from brazen.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: And if you are caught [*-1] or if people complain , [*]simply argue that `` everyone does it '' or `` no one said [0] I should n't [*?*] '' and brazen it out .
